Name: InstructionName
Description: A name for the Instruction. May be expressed in multiple languages. Repeat the element to express names with different content, for example different names for different systems.

Name: Label
Description: A display label for the Instruction. Supports multiple language versions of the same content as well as optional formatting of the content. Repeat for labels with different content, for example, labels with differing length limitations.

Name: Description
Description: A description of the content and purpose of the Instruction. Supports multiple language versions of the same content as well as optional formatting of the content.

Name: InParameter
Description: A parameter that may accept content from outside the Instruction. In addition to standard parameter content may provide the instructions for limiting the allowable array index.

Name: AssociatedImage
Description: An image associated with the Instruction, located at the provided URN or URL.

Name: InstructionText
Description: The content of the Instruction text provided using DynamicText. Note that when using Dynamic Text, the full InstructionText must be repeated for multi-language versions of the content. The InstructionText may also be repeated to provide a dynamic and plain text version of the instruction. This allows for accurate rendering of the instruction in a non-dynamic environment like print.
